channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security QRadar SIEM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security QRadar SIEM

item.title: CVE-2023-26273|2024-08-02T11:46:23.910Z -- ibm -- security%20qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5.0 could allow an authenticated user to perform unauthorized actions due to hazardous input validation. IBM X-Force ID: 248134.

item.title: CVE-2023-26276|2024-08-02T11:46:24.343Z -- ibm -- security%20qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5.0 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 248147.

item.title: CVE-2023-22875|2024-08-02T10:20:31.096Z -- ibm -- security%20qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.4 and 7.5copies certificate key files used for SSL/TLS in the QRadar web user interface to managed hosts in the deployment that do not require that key. IBM X-Force ID: 244356.

item.title: CVE-2023-26274|2024-08-02T11:46:23.505Z -- ibm -- security%20qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 248144.
